name: DocTabs
description: Documentation site tab component for SCSS/React/CDN content separation

props.name: tabs
props.description: Array of tabs to display (only tabs with content)

features: Consistent structure for all doc pages

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
<DocTabs
  tabs={[
    { key: 'scss', label: 'SCSS', content: <ScssContent /> },
    { key: 'react', label: 'React', content: <ReactContent /> },
  ]}
  defaultTab="scss"
/>

examples.title: With CDN Tab
examples.code:
<DocTabs
  tabs={[
    { key: 'scss', label: 'SCSS', content: <ScssContent /> },
    { key: 'react', label: 'React', content: <ReactContent /> },
    { key: 'cdn', label: 'CDN', content: <CdnContent /> },
  ]}
/>
